description: Samantha Sin and Charlotte Vale suffer intensely in the second half of this edited live show. Cyd binds Charlotte's arms tightly and secures them pulled up behind her head, exposing the soft, sensitive flesh underneath her arms and down both of her sides underneath her armpit. He uses so many tiny painful clamps that it is all Charlotte can do to stop from crying. Her situation is unbearably intense and she is getting more desperate for relief by the second.Cyd allows Samantha to crawl over and take the pins off one by one and kiss Charlotte's skin to make in better. The resulting show of tenderness in the midst of Charlotte's suffering makes for quite a scene, but it doesn't last, as Cyd soon tires of it and decides to deliver more punishment for sadistic pleasure.
title: Samantha Sin Live, Part 2
